title: Attention Seattle Typophiles!
content:
This guy is giving away a Miller Simplex flatbed cylinder press for free! I would take it but I don't have room for it or money to hire a truck to haul it.   
   
 [Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040015/http:/seattle.craigslist.org/zip/40885261.html) for details.
author: antiuser
